problem.p: A projectile is launched so it will travel the furthest up an incline. If the incline makes an angle b with the horizontal, what is the angle above the horizontal for which the projectile should be launched. Answer using degrees, not radians. Hint: use an online computer algebra system to simplify the trigonometry (such as Wolfram Alpha)

hintpart.p: Remember to put your answer in degrees, not radians.
